# TheRoundTable Brief

## Outcome
Deliver high-quality multi-character AI conversations with consistent behavior across web and mobile clients.

## Repositories
- Frontend: `github.com/Mayokun26/theroundtable-frontend`
- Backend: `github.com/Mayokun26/theroundtable-backend`

## Stable Architecture
- Frontend: Next.js + TypeScript + MUI
- Backend: Express + TypeScript + DynamoDB + Redis + OpenAI
- Deployment: S3/CloudFront (frontend), Lambda/API Gateway (backend)
- Mobile track: Expo/React Native

## Non-Negotiables
- Preserve dynamic character voices and inter-character response behavior.
- Keep TypeScript strict mode and `@/*` alias conventions.
